summary:
Ever gone through a dungeon with infinite paralysis poisons? Did you yawn too?
Ever use an endless loop of fortify professions? It sounds fun, but I found that it gets old fast.
descriptionHtml:
Ever gone through a dungeon with infinite paralysis poisons? Did you yawn too?
Ever use an endless loop of fortify professions? Yeah, it sounds fun, but I found that it gets old fast.

At first I decided to just ignore the potions whenever I found them.
Then one day, I see a black potions across the room. What\'s that?! Oh.. paralysis.
Then I see a locked chest and find the right position for my lock to open it. Great.. just another fortify enchanting elixir.
On top of that, it spoiled the fun of alchemy, too. There would be spell effects for an ingredient that I am eager to discover, but of course it is just one of those..

Would they please go away?  Yes

This mod removes paralysis, fortify smithing, and fortify enchanting effects from potions and ingredients.

You might also like:

Improved Armor Formula
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15860
Improved Ammo Weight
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14389
author: Troy1010
